title: $750, Quiet, Clean, Respectful Home, All Inclusive. Private Room
description:
The room is of a large size, with a big window that lets alot of sunlight in, and has a nice view of the street.

The room also has a large built-in closet.


Driveway parking for one vehicle is included.


Rent includes Utilities and Hydro, use of non-coin washer and dryer, dishwasher, and unlimited Wi-Fi.


The room is private, with a keyed lockable door.


House Features:

Central Air conditioning

Large eat-in kitchen

Large Covered front porch

High Fenced backyard

Large driveway

Firepit in backyard

Close to route 2 bus stop

Close to expressway


I am the owner/landlord, and will also be living in the property.


Must be a non-smoker and I would prefer a non-drinker.

Cannot do any drugs or vape.

Use of cannabis is prohibited.


Small caged animals are allowed.


Application process will require a credit check.

References will also be required.


Perfect for people who do not want to live in a party environment.


There are rules to follow to ensure an environment that is respectful of others.


One occupant per room.


The room is 11.25 square meters / 121 square ft.


Room is not furnished.


No overnight guests


Rent is $750 per month


First and last month's rent is required before move-in.


Available to both men and women.


Please include in all replies:


1) Your first and last name.

2) Your age.

3) Your place of fulltime employment/education, including company name/school name.

4) The date when you want to move in.

5) How long you would want to stay.

6) Your sex.


In addition, include the code "Rent2024" in all responses, to confirm you have read the ad.


If this ad is still up, the room is currently available.

title: 2 rooms for rent Modern home
description:
2 rooms for rent , 1 @900 monthly and one at 1000. More photos are available however i am not conformable posting our whole home online. I'd prefer you come by to view you won't be disappointed.

Welcome to our recently renovated and meticulously maintained home located in a great neighborhood at Selkirk Drive, Kitchener. Ottawa St South and Strasburg area. This home is perfect for those seeking a clean, contemporary living space with access to nearby amenities.

Key Features of the Home:

Modern Design: Stylish décor and a welcoming atmosphere.

Shared Spaces:

Fully equipped kitchen.

Spotless shared bathroom.

Spacious and comfortable main living room incase of visiotrs .

Laundry: on-site laundry facilities.

Utilities Included: Heating (gas), central air, and all other utilities are included in the rent.

2 rooms available
Room Details:

Master Bedroom – $1,000/month

Size: 15 ft x 9 ft (135 sq ft)

Features: Generous closet space, large window providing ample natural light, option for furnished or unfurnished.

Second Bedroom – $900/month

Size: 11 ft x 10 ft (110 sq ft)

Features: Bright window, cozy layout, option for furnished or unfurnished.

Additional Perks:

Parking: Available nearby. Not on-site

Neighborhood: Quiet and safe community with convenient access to shopping, dining, and public transit.

Proximity to Educational Institutions:

University of Waterloo: Approximately 9 km away, a 15-minute drive. citeturn0search6

Conestoga College Doon Campus: Approximately 11.6 km away, about a 13-minute drive. citeturn0search2

Requirements:

First and last month’s rent required.

Seeking clean, respectful tenants who are either working professionals or students.

No smoking inside the home.

If you’re looking for a clean, comfortable, and modern place to live, this is the perfect spot for you!

For more information or to schedule a viewing, please contact us today.

No pets, no smoking inside. Please email jamila.labaouro@gmail.com or message here
